Hi there!

A Data Analyst plays a crucial role in helping organizations make sense of their data. They collect, process, and perform statistical analyses on data to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Their main goal is to translate complex datasets into understandable information that can be used to improve business decisions, optimize processes, and solve problems. This often involves creating reports, dashboards, and visualizations to present their findings to stakeholders.
